ComicInfo.Summary:
Becky Montcrief is pursued through a frozen wasteland by a horror she never suspected - Drake Sinclair! If she hopes to survive, a terrible price must be paid and a sacrifice must be made. Meanwhile, Gord Cantrell, Kirby Hale, and Asher Cobb make a last stand against the Sword of Abraham!
